card_name: Times Black ICICI Bank Credit Card
card_usp: Unlimited complimentary international and domestic airport lounge access, 2.5% reward points on international spends, and exclusive lifestyle management services.
annual_fee_waiver: Annual fee waiver on spends of ₹25 lakh in an anniversary year
rewards_program: Earn 2.5% reward points on international spends and 2% on domestic spends.
spend_based_reversal: Annual fee waived on spends of ₹25 lakh in an anniversary year
reward_points: 2.5% on international spends, 2% on domestic spends
rewards: Luxury stay gift card from EaseMyTrip worth ₹10,000, Travel Visa benefits worth ₹10,000, Annual membership of Zomato Gold, and more.
features: Unlimited complimentary airport lounge access, concierge services, low forex markup fee, and comprehensive insurance coverage.
welcome_benefit: Luxury Stay Gift Card from EaseMyTrip worth ₹10,000
milestone_benefit: Annual fee waiver on spends of ₹25 lakh
fuel_benefits: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on all transactions
travel_benefits: Luxury airport transfers worth ₹10,000, Klook’s international experiences worth ₹10,000, and more.
lounge_access: Unlimited complimentary access to over 1,300 lounges in 148 countries and 600 cities worldwide.
concierge_service: 24x7 domestic and international concierge service available.
insurance: Comprehensive insurance coverage for travel disruptions and purchases.
full_card_description: The Times Black ICICI Bank Credit Card offers premium travel, shopping, and lifestyle benefits, including unlimited lounge access, high rewards, and robust insurance, making it ideal for frequent travelers.
eligibility_criteria: Minimum age of 21 years, with a minimum annual income of ₹2,40,000 for salaried and ₹3,60,000 for self-employed individuals.
terms_and_conditions: All dues must be paid on time; rewards program subject to change.
